amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds for Executive Order 13166 which directs Federal agencies to provide foreign-language services to anyone who might seek to engage with federal, state, and local governments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 386).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. King (IA).
